divs: sighting detailstoo much to list. i'd rather just speak to a serious researcher. but in short, i first saw the object from my garage. it was roughly 1\2 mile away. i then went to the front door to get a better look and when i got there it was literally right across the street less than 100 feet away. it's as if it knew i saw it and came to see me. it was completely silent and hovered. disk shaped with white lights around it and a single red light on top. a total of 5 people were there to see this.
Summary: Hovered across street at around 50 feet
